description:
Salmon baby doll Scoop Neck tee with gray Battlenose Dolphin main screen, pink shadow effect & gray ATA Logo stitch detail on lower-right front hemline.

Shirt is super soft 100% combed, ring-spun, pre-shrunk (but not pre-washed) cotton. Seriously great fit!

Shirt is super soft 100% cotton and is pre-shrunk (but not pre-washed). Amazing fit!

name: Fashion Tall

description:
Black and White is a Big Cartel theme that is perfect to build out your shop. Features include a homepage slideshow for landscape images, large product photos, css for black or white background and custom page templates for common shop content.

Shipped with 6 special page templates perfect to help you build out an entire shop with New product, On Sale, About, FAQ, Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions pages. Just follow the directions and you will have a full site in no time.

Key Features

  • Homepage: Large Slideshow
  • Large product images
  • New Arrivals & On Sale: Custom templates
  • About & FAQ: Custom templates
  • Privacy Policy & Terms: Custom templates
  • Includes CSS for white or black background
  • 3 products across
  • Related products on Product page
  • Sharing integration on Product page
  • Multiple product thumbs on Product page
  • Product thumbnail preview in Shopping Cart
  • Product Title and Pricing display on hover

Theme Tips

  • Revert theme to "Sexy" before installing
  • Upload a logo with a width of 960px
  • Use the same image ratio for all products
  • Edit the menu using the Layout template
  • Make sure to add special custom templates

Installation & Setup

  • Simple understanding of how to copy & paste HTML & CSS into Big Cartel's editor
  • Always open purchased files with a plain text editor to view full contents
  • Insert Twitter & Facebook links in Layout file
  • Use Big Cartel editor to select theme colors
  • Having trouble? WE CAN HELP.
black-and-white
name: Black and White

description:
Redeemed is a slick new theme with powerful admin options. Features include a homepage slider for featured items and intelligently-built related products.

name: Sunday Drive Slideshow

description:
New Beginnings Tall is a variation of the New Beginnings template. However, this template is designed specifically for the shops using tall images with an aspect ratio of 2x3, which will be many of you selling clothing.

Only purchase this version of the theme if you are using or plan to use all images in a size ratio of 2x3, or portrait format. That would be like 200x300 pixels or 600x900pixels. If you are using square images it will work but I would suggest looking at the original New Beginnings Theme.

Theme Features

  • BIG product photos
  • Tailored for 2x3 aspect product photos
  • Space for large logo/banner up to 860pixels wide
  • 3 Products Across
  • Image thumbnails on detail and cart pages
  • Special Shop Menu collapses categories on click.
  • Special New Arrivals and On Sale Products custom page templates
  • Twitter, Facebook and Google Plus share buttons
  • RSS, Twitter, Facebook, Contact icons with links
  • Canonical urls for better SEO
  • Included CSS for black background version

Theme Tips

  • Revert theme to "Sexy" before installing
  • Upload a logo with a width of 960px
  • Use the same image ratio for all products
  • Enable Best Selling & Latest Products
  • Turn on/off Search, Inventory Bars, Artist Labels to view how the theme adjusts
  • Edit the menus using the Layout template

Installation & Setup

  • Simple understanding of how to copy & paste HTML & CSS into Big Cartel's editor
  • Always open purchased files with a plain text editor to view full contents
  • Insert Twitter & Facebook links in Layout file
  • Use Big Cartel css editor to select theme colors
  • Having trouble? WE CAN HELP.

description:
New Beginnings is a clean start for any new or existing Big Cartel shop. With the basic features of Big Cartel like top products and best sellers in the sidebar some special features have been added. Using ideas and features from our popular Sunday and Sunday Drive templates your Big Cartel shop is sure to look great.

Looking for something that looks better with portrait cropped images? Try out the New Beginnings Portrait theme.

Theme Features

  • Space for large logo/banner up to 980pixels wide
  • 4 Products Across
  • Image thumbnails on detail and cart pages

name: New Beginnings

description:
SPLASH big cartel template is designed to be similar to the original Sexy theme offered in your Big Cartel account. However, Splash brings in some added design features along with a slideshow on the homepage everyone desires.

With just a little bit of html editing required you can use your own images of 750 pixel width on the home page slideshow by replacing image urls. You will need to use a 3rd party host for your images, such as a blog or photobucket.com.

Key Theme Features

  • Slideshow on home page using images hosted on 3rd party site
  • 3 products per row
  • Product thumbnails on individual product detail pages
  • Product thumbnails in cart checkout
  • 750 pixel wide page design.
  • Canonical urls for better SEO
  • Facebook, Twitter and Google share buttons on product pages.

Theme Tips

  • Revert theme to "Sexy" before installing
  • Upload a logo with a width of 750px
  • Use the same image ratio for all products
  • Enable Best Selling & Latest Products

description:
How He Loves theme offers a new option for your Big Cartel site. From built in Facebook Like button support, twitter and facebook links, and interesting displays of newest and popular products. The improved product pages and shopping cart page should help build the professional image of your store. Use this theme to launch a new shop or take on a new design.

Key Features

  • Drop Down Product Category Menu
  • Facebook Like, Twitter and Google Share Buttons on all product pages
  • Classic sleek lines.
  • Logo upload file can be used as a header but not needed to make the site look good.
  • 4 products across.
  • Works with all product photo shapes but best with square aspect ratio.
  • Canonical urls for better SEO

How He Loves Big Cartel theme was named after one of my favorite songs at the time, How He Loves performed by David Crowder Band. It speaks of how God loves each of us in an amazing and powerful way.

description:
Sunday Drive is a clean look inspired by our Sunday theme. With product thumbnails, images of products in the cart and artist support it is a great choice to style your Big Cartel store.

This theme offers a clean looking shop with attention to detail. Taking cues from the popular Sunday theme, Sunday Drive brings some new details and features every store owner should appreciate. With support for the artists feature, facebook like buttons and product thumbnail previews on both the product detail and cart pages your shop will look great.

Key Features

  • Artists, Top Products, Newest Products all supported.
  • Artists links on product page.
  • Displays shipping pricing where available.
  • 4 images across

  • Product thumbnail preview in cart.

sunday
name: Sunday

description:
We are Bringing Sexy Back by giving the default Big Cartel theme, Sexy, an update it has needed for a long time. A theme with lots of built in features and function.

The default out of the box theme on Big Cartel is Sexy. This theme is used by many of the 100,000+ shops on Big Cartel. This theme has seen it's day and people should have more choices. So we want to offer to you the updated and revised version we call, 'Bringing Sexy Back' that includes a slideshow.

The theme takes many of the basic requests for customization and integrates them right into the theme and offers several variable settings to show or hide features. All described in the README file with the theme download.

Key Features

  • Homepage slider in place for images sized at 716x350pixels by default. Yes that large green box is rotating images with links if you choose.
  • A new view at your top-selling, newest and on-sale products on the home page with thumbnails.
  • Theme Settings for easily adding your Blog, Twitter and Facebook links to the Info link list.
  • An easy to use Theme Setting to move the sidebar from the right side to the left side.
  • The Simple Color Editor still works with this theme.
  • 4 products per row instead of 3.
  • Facebook, Twitter and Google share buttons built in on each product page.
  • Product thumbnails on individual product pages.
  • Artist and Category links on each product page.
  • Next and Previous product navigation.
  • 917 pixel width page great for a nice wide banner
  • Canonical urls for better seo

Theme Tips

  • Banner/Logo up to 917 pixels wide.
  • Use 3rd party site for slideshow images.
  • The Slider is found within the HOME template.
  • Custom settings in LAYOUT template.
  • Enable Best Selling & Latest Products
  • Use the same image ratio for all products

Installation & Setup

  • Simple understanding of how to copy & paste HTML & CSS into Big Cartel's editor
  • Always open purchased files with a plain text editor to view full contents
  • Insert Twitter & Facebook links in Layout file
  • Use Big Cartel css editor to select theme colors
  • Having trouble? WE CAN HELP.
bringingsexyback
name: Bringing Sexy Back

description:
Jefferson is the perfect introduction to what custom themes on Big Cartel are all about. It is nearly a free big cartel theme.

The default Sexy theme receives product thumbnail display on the detailed pages and cart page. Google, Twitter and Facebook share buttons integrated into the product pages. And what many people want is 4 products across. Set up your site today at a minimal cost and still be able to use the same color schemes as you had been originally but now you can use a larger banner, up to 936 pixels wide!

Key Theme Features

  • 4 products per row
  • 936 pixel wide page design.
  • Multiple product thumbs on Product page
  • Product thumbnail preview in Shopping Cart
  • Sharing integration on Product page
  • based on Sexy Theme, makes for an easy upgrade

Theme Tips

  • Revert theme to "Sexy" before installing
  • Upload a logo with a width of 936px
  • Use the same image ratio for all products
  • Enable Best Selling & Latest Products
  • Turn on/off Search, Inventory Bars, Artist Labels to view how the theme adjusts
